mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_INFO WHERE LOGINNAME=#{loginname} and deleteflag = '0'
select * from roles where rolesId in (select rolesid from user_rel_roles where userid = #{userid} and deleteflag = '0' ) and deleteflag = '0'

select * from authority where authid in( select authrel.authid from roles_rel_auth authrel inner join roles r on r.rolesid = authrel.rolesid and r.deleteflag = '0' inner join user_rel_roles userrel on userrel.rolesid = r.rolesid and userrel.deleteflag = '0' where userrel.userid = #{userid} and authrel.deleteflag = '0' ) and deleteflag = '0'

select concat(auth.authid) authid, auth.authurl ,r.rolescode from authority auth inner join roles_rel_auth authrel on auth.authid = authrel.authid and authrel.deleteflag = '0' inner join roles r on r.rolesid = authrel.rolesid and r.deleteflag = '0' where auth.deleteflag = '0' order by auth.authid
